name: stremio-enhanced
description: Electron-based Stremio client with plugins and themes support.

scripts.dev: cls && npm run build && npx electron --log-level=3 ./dist/main.js --devtools
scripts.package-all: npm run build && npx electron-packager ./ stremio-enhanced --overwrite --asar --platform=all --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=./images/icon.ico
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npx electron-packager ./ stremio-enhanced --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=./images/icon.ico
scripts.package-macos: npm run build && npx electron-packager ./ stremio-enhanced --overwrite --asar --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=./images/icon.ico
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && npx electron-packager ./ stremio-enhanced --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=./images/icon.ico
scripts.package-macos-arm: npm run build && npx electron-packager ./ stremio-enhanced --overwrite --asar --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=./images/icon.ico

author: REVENGE
